title: ChronRelic – Artifact Tracker
description: ChronRelic is a knowledge-sharing platform for historic and mythical artifacts. Users can learn detailed histories, and upload their own explored artifacts. Includes Firebase Authentication, protected routes, and MongoDB for storing artifacts and user posts.

title: Workora Freelancing Platform
description: A modern freelance job portal that connects freelancers with clients. It features Firebase Authentication, task posting, bidding system, and user dashboards. Built with React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB for seamless full-stack integration.

title: App Store – App Explorer
description: A sleek application showcasing platform where users can search, preview, and install a wide range of applications. Powered by Firebase Authentication and built using React and Tailwind. Search and filtering are handled with real-time UI updates.
